response_mode.non_streaming_desc: Suitable for low-end devices, reduce lag.

floating_button.show_desc: Show floating button on web pages.
floating_button.hide_desc: Hide floating button from web pages.

position_option.left_desc: Display floating button on the left side.
position_option.right_desc: Display floating button on the right side.

custom_prompts.title: Active custom prompts
custom_prompts.override_note: * Basic settings are overridden by active custom prompts.

prompts.title: Prompts
prompts.user_note: Use the __CONTENT__ to insert the dynamic content
tip: This feature works best with the Gemini 2.5 Flash model or higher.
The "Prompt Enhancement" feature just formats and explains based on your prompt input.
To prompt in a different language, adjust the output language in Settings > Summary.

errors.api_key: API Key not configured. Please check your API key in the settings.
errors.unauthorized: Unauthorized access. Please check your API key and permissions.
errors.quota: API quota exceeded. Please check your usage limits or try again later.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.server: API server error. Please try again later.
errors.content: Content not found or could not be processed.
errors.permission: Missing browser permissions. Please check extension settings.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.streaming: Streaming error. Data might be incomplete.
errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

apiKey.title: Invalid API Key
apiKey.message: The API key you provided is invalid or has been disabled. Please check the key in the settings and try again.
suggestions: Verify your API key in the settings.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Access
unauthorized.message: Your API key does not have the required permissions for this operation. This can happen with tuned models or specific API restrictions.
suggestions: Check your API permissions and ensure they are sufficient.
Contact the API provider's support for assistance.

quota.title: API Quota Exceeded
quota.message: You have exceeded your usage limit for the selected API. Please check your account billing or try again later.
suggestions: Review your API usage and billing details.
Consider upgrading your plan if you frequently hit limits.

network.title: Network Connection Error
network.message: Could not connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and any firewall or proxy settings.
suggestions: Ensure you have a stable internet connection and disable any VPN/proxy if active.

server.title: API Server Error
server.message: The AI provider's server encountered an internal error (5xx). This is usually a temporary issue. Please wait a moment and try again.
suggestions: Wait a few moments and try your request again.
Check the provider's status page for known outages.

content.title: Content Error
content.message: The extension could not retrieve the necessary content from this page (e.g., transcript not found, page text too short).
suggestions: Ensure the video has a transcript available
Make sure the web page is fully loaded and accessible.

permission.title: Permission Denied
permission.message: The extension lacks the necessary browser permissions to perform this action. Please check the extension settings.
suggestions: Review and grant necessary permissions in your browser's extension settings.

unknown.title: Unknown Error
unknown.message: An unexpected error occurred. If this problem persists, please consider reporting it.
suggestions: Check if the video has a transcript.
Ensure the page has fully loaded.
Try again with a different page or video.

welcome.configure_api_keys: Please configure API keys in the settings first
welcome.api_setup_guide: You'll need to set up your AI provider API key to start using Summarizer.
